title: Finally Got the internet to stream!
body:
Hey guys, I go by the alias SahAnxsty, thanks for taking the time to read, 
I've recently upgraded my internet to crazy speeds I'd never heard possible in Australia and I've decided I'd stream.
Although I'm probably not the most entertaining guy going around I'm not the lamest either, so we could all have some good times if you come and watch.
I'm Diamond V OCE with my highest being Diamond III, if you're rather new or just not comfortable with ranked play yet, I've got tips and tricks I can teach along the way on our paths to glory and good times. 

Again I appreciate that you've read this, feel free to check me out or not, **twitch.tv/SahAnxsty**

Stay Beautiful, xo

replies.body: Great for him, I hope he does well on his path. I'll walk mine and not give a flying shit for temp name trolls.
xo, Donger. I'll probably be streaming later tonight around 8-late. thanks
